DOC.brief_summary: The investigator aim determine effect HP diet CVD risk factor hs-CRP among overweight obese woman .
DOC.brief_title: High Protein Weight Loss Diet , High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein Cardiovascular Risks Among Obese Women
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Studies regard effect high protein ( HP ) diet cardiovascular ( CVD ) risk factor report contradictory result . Objective : In present study , aim determine effect HP diet CVD risk factor hs-CRP among overweight obese woman . Design : In randomize controlled trial , recruit 60 overweight obese woman , age 20-65 year HP control energy restrict diet three month ( protein , carbohydrate , fat : 25 % , 45 % , 30 % vs. 15 % , 55 % , 30 % , respectively ) . Total protein amount , divide animal plant source 50 % -50 % animal source distribute ( half/half ) meats dairy product . Fasting blood sample , hs-CRP , lipid profile , systolic diastolic blood pressure anthropometric measurement measure base standard guideline .
DOC.criteria: woman age 2065 year BMI > 25 kg/m2 smoker history renal , liver , metabolic disease type 1 2 diabetes gastrointestinal , respiratory , cardiovascular , metabolic , liver renal disease macroalbuminuria pregnancy lactating
